## CourseStructureJSON.getUserCourseStrucuture() method

Get the course-structure of the user as JS/JSON by aggregating the user permission of the user to learning objects, lrss, groups (roles of groups).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getUserCourseStrucuture(userId: string, relations?: RelationModel[]): Promise<CourseStructure[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  userId | string | Id of the user |
|  relations | RelationModel\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Pre fill relations to enhance performance |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[CourseStructure](./clm-ext-learning_objects.coursestructure.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;
